column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Waited 1.5 hrs to sit after we were told 45 mins when we checked in. I don't mind waiting if the restaurant is busy.  But when I see 5...yes 5 two person tables empty. For at least 30 mins while I'm waiting
column2: that's just poor service. Some bullshite about the fryer being down and they could not sit new parties.  Guess what
column4: not chicken McNuggets. Busy I can tolerate
column5: Incompetence I cannot.  Last time I'll come here. Oh then there's the left over noodle on my spoon when we finally sat down. See picture. WTF??
